ComicInfo.Title: Mad's Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; A Mad Peek Behind the Scenes at the Making of Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me; The Lighter Side of…; A Mad Look at Phones; Mad's Stuck-in-Traffic, Second-by-Second Timetable; Mr. Movie Surround Sound Home Theater System Operating Instructions; Mad-sterpiece Theater Presents: The Pokemon Players; Monroe and... the Motorbike; Livin’ to Feed Al Roker; Setting the Microsoft Monopoly Lawsuit on Judge Judy; Tarzany; The Mad NASCAR Primer; Hokeycon
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, appreciation, driving, awareness, relationships, therapy, the cost of living, activists, height, modern dining, television, the office, achievement, and doctors.
